item.title: PHP - install phpcs(PHP CodeSniffer)
item.description: PHP - install phpcs(PHP CodeSniffer) Use pear install phpcs in Linux(Ubuntu 14.04) sudo pear install --alldeps php_codesniffer in Mac(Mac OS X 10.10.1 Yosemite) install pear sudo curl -O http://pear.php.net/go-pear.phar then sudo php -d detect_unicode=0 go-pear.phar Update pear upgrade pear pear upgrade install codesniffer sudo pear install --alldeps php_codesniffer check phpcs -i return The installed coding standards are MySource, PEAR, PHPCS, PSR1, PSR2, Squiz and Zend if return Warning: include_once(PHP/CodeSniffer/CLI.php): failed to open stream: No such file or directory in /usr/bin/phpcs on line 22 Warning: include_once(): Failed opening 'PHP/CodeSniffer/CLI.
